Texto: 
post-surgical scar right breast without palpable mass.
6 month mammogram.
wire delineating surgical scar. surgical clips in surgical bed.   asymmetric architectural distortion, trabecular and skin thickening
post-therapy changes of the breast
post-therapy (radiation) changes of the breast
6 month mammogram after lumpectomy and radiation therapy for breast carcinoma.
